name: Flower Fiesta
description: to play you need to get two baskets (42) flowers and place them in the big basket by going up to it  by pressing (or holding) space while you are very close to a flower press q when you have flowers in your basket to plant a flower wasd and arrow keys to move (also controller but thats work in progress) left shift and r to regenerate the world also if you give feedback that would be much  appreciated
